title: Minnie and Moo and the Potato from Planet X
description: Who else but Minnie and Moo would be the ones to meet and greet a one-eyed alien who looks like a potato? When Spud crashes his space ship into their pasture, he is desperately seeking "space fuel" so that he can finish his delivery of the "Anti-Bump Cream" needed to keep the planets from bumping into each other. And he only has 30 minutes left Lucky for Spud-- and for the world-- that bovine buddies Minnie and Moo have just the fuel he needs-- a white liquid that tastes yummy with chocolate chip cookies Silliness abounds in this playful beginning reader.
author: Denys Cazet
